mapper.select: SELECT course_usr_learn.learn_time, course_usr_learn.id, course_usr_learn.content_id FROM course_usr_learn INNER JOIN course_content ON course_usr_learn.course_id = course_content.course_id AND course_usr_learn.content_id = course_content.id WHERE course_usr_learn.user_id = #{userId} AND course_usr_learn.course_id = #{courseId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course_usr_learn (user_id, course_id, content_id, learn_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{courseId}, #{contentId}, #{learnTime})
